trans-unit.target: TEXT_STMBDY404_02613_RODNEY_000_000<tab>Ah, adventurer, you couldn't have come at a better time! The preparations for restoring the ward are in place, I'm pleased to report, and with our practiced efficiency, we've established a base camp on practically the doorstep of the Students' headquarters!

TEXT_STMBDY404_02613_RODNEY_100_000<tab>Now, in keeping with tradition, the region in which the camp lies has been given a name: Hydatos, a reference to its watery disposition. Gods willing, this will be last corner of the island that the expedition will need to contend with.
TEXT_STMBDY404_02613_RODNEY_000_001<tab>But without further ado, let me know when you are ready to head over. Mistress Krile is very keen to resume her efforts with your help!
TEXT_STMBDY404_02613_SYSTEM_000_010<tab>You now have access to the Forbidden Land, Eureka Hydatos. Like Anemos, Pagos, and Pyros, Hydatos can be explored in parties of up to eight players, or solo.
TEXT_STMBDY404_02613_SYSTEM_000_011<tab>To embark on your journey to Hydatos, speak with Rodney at Pier #1 in Kugane.

TEXT_STMBDY404_02613_SYSTEM_000_012<tab>Please be advised that all excursions into <var 28 ((ContentFinderCondition)) E8032C /var>, are item level synced. Gear exceeding an item level of <var 28 ((ContentFinderCondition)) E80215 /var> will be adjusted.
